title: League won't let me connect my facebook account
body: Just like the title says, I go to my friends list, go to Social Media, and click the facebook button but nothing happens at all. No link no message in client no nothing .-.

replies.body: Hey, thanks for the heads up here!  This is a known issue and our devs are looking into it.  I don't have any additional info on this, but I wanted to let you know we're aware!
